text: Ta BOH yakshcho dlya vas tinʹ cherez rechi kotryy Vin stvoryuvav, ta yakshcho dlya vas domivky u horakh, ta yakshcho dlya vas odyah shcho zakhyshchayete vas z tepla, ta odyah shcho zakhyshchayete koly vy boretesʹ u viyni. Vin takym chynom perfects Yoho blahoslovennya na vas, shcho vy mozhete pidkorytysya
